title: Database unavailable on attempt 60/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
body:
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

How to reproduce the problem
---------
<!-- Include the details of how the problem occurred. Which option did you choose to install doccano? Did you come across an error? What else did you try? -->

```bash
sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
```

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04
*   Python Version Used: Python 3.6
*   When you install doccano: 2020-8-2-20:10
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc):  docker-compose

When I first download the code, and use docker to start the project:  some errors:


```
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 47/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 48/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 49/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 50/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 51/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 52/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 53/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 54/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 55/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 56/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 57/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 58/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 59/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"                         backend_1   | Database unavailable on attempt 60/60: FATAL:  password authentication failed for user "doccano"
```
